Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This unique offering holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. Given its exceptional nature, we are extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9500. We believe this is an unparalleled chance to own something truly remarkable. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless and personalized experience tailored to your needs. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
